name: Prop Swap
description:
NOTE: IF THE WEB VERSION STARTS RUNNING SLOWLY, TRY DOWNLOADING THE EXECUTABLE VERSION AND PLAYING THAT

Prop Swap is a puzzle platformer in which you can link objects to exchange their properties.  Whether it is to overcome danger or pave a new path forward, joining objects through your linking power will be crucial to success.  The game features nine complete levels with a variety of object types, meaning you will always be on your toes.  Best of luck!

Controls:

A/D - Move

W - Jump

Double Tap and Hold W - Climb Link

J - Link

K - Unlink

L - Zoom Out

R - Restart Level

Esc - Return to Menu
